trans-unit.target: Devolve os dados a partir de <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.StateChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.StateChanged> event is raised by the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> class.
StateChangedEventArgs derives from <xref:System.EventArgs> and is passed to handlers for <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.StateChanged> events.
trans-unit.target: StateChangedEventArgs deriva de <xref:System.EventArgs>e é transferida para os processadores para <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.StateChanged>eventos.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.StateChanged> </xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: A shared speech recognizer's state cannot be changed programmatically.
trans-unit.target: Não é possível alterar o estado de um utilitário de reconhecimento de voz partilhado através de programação.

trans-unit.source: Users can change a shared speech recognizer's state using the Speech Recognition user interface (UI) or through the **Speech Recognition** member of the Windows **Control Panel**.
trans-unit.target: Os utilizadores podem alterar o estado de um utilitário de reconhecimento de voz partilhada através da interface de utilizador (UI) de reconhecimento de voz ou através de **reconhecimento de voz** membro das janelas da **painel de controlo**.

trans-unit.source: Both the **On** and **Sleep** settings in the Speech Recognition UI correspond to the `Listening` state.
trans-unit.target: Ambos os o **no** e **no modo de suspensão** definições na IU de reconhecimento de voz correspondem para o `Listening` estado.

trans-unit.source: The **Off** setting in the Speech Recognition UI corresponds to <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerState>.
trans-unit.target: O **desativar** definição na IU de reconhecimento de voz corresponde <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerState>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerState>

trans-unit.source: Gets the current state of the shared speech recognition engine in Windows.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o estado atual do motor de reconhecimento de voz partilhado no Windows.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerState"></xref> instance that indicates whether the state of a shared speech recognition engine is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Listening" name="Listening" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_Stopped" name="Stopped" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerState"> </xref> instância que indica se o estado de um motor de reconhecimento de voz partilhado é <xref uid="langword_csharp_Listening" name="Listening" href=""> </xref> ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_Stopped" name="Stopped" href=""> </xref>.
